title: Stone Embrace: A Stone Guardian After-Scene (Entwined Realms)
features: In the New Realms, Love can be the Most Dangerous Battle of All... Terak has fought all enemies to claim Larissa. It does not matter his own Clan looks upon the union with misgivings. It does not matter her family see a monster when they see him. It does not matter, because Larissa is his. And any who would try to take her away? They will see what a Gargoyle will do to protect his mate.
description: If you love urban fantasy with a steamy romance and intense action, you need to read Danielle Monsch! ~ SM Reine, Author of The Ascension Series
